content.prompt: The Golden Stool (sika dwa kofi) of the Ashanti people must be presented on its side, resting on its own stool, to remind viewers that

choices.label: failing to offer a seat to a guest is inhospitable
the seat is the most impressive part of the stool
being a leader can be serious and difficult
the stool is sacred and no person may sit on it

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
